Name: Saffraan
Review Text: The food is tasty indeed. A perfect place for grill dishes. Not bad for vegetarians. Though, it's a bit crowded now since the restrictions have been lifted. The distancing measures could have been better.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Excellent place! The dishes are great quality and the food is very tasty. I tried the meat a few times, it's excellent and perfectly cooked. The pasta dishes are really delicious too. Will come back for the fish next time! â€¦

Name: Saffraan
Review Text:
My wife and I were recommended to Saffraan by the Hotel Pestana and what an awesome experience. From the food to the atmosphere, it was great.
I do not eat much of this style of food but I would if I lived next store to Saffraan!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: We enjoyed sharing a plate of mezzes for 2 ppl and didnâ€™t need more food. Also the patio seating area is very pleasant in good weather. They have very tasty fish too.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: The food was really great and the interior is very cozy. We were with a large group of people. The owner gave great suggestions, including wines. The portions were quite substantial. The owner mentioned also that the menu changes regularly, so definetely coming back soon.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: The food was delicious, and the service was great. The only problem was that there was no    English menu, but the staff explained the items, so it wasn't a big deal.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Absolutely love this restaurant every time I meant Amsterdam I go here the food is amazing

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Cingene kofte was a very pleasant surprise - I haven't asked them - but I'm sure it was grilled on charcoal, which was even at lunch time and for such a low price for the effort! Seating outside is very nice on a good weather - chairs and â€¦

Name: Saffraan
Review Text:
Adana Kpap is great
Thanks to staff, they are very friendly
Turkish food

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: The food was very delicious and tasted authentic mediterranian, the staff was friendly and the atmosphere was fitting. It is a bit pricey though. Try out combining a salad and a appetizer for a budget price.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text:
Real good food, fair prices and a nice outside patio. The mixed tapas koud was great (Hummus :)), mediterranean sea offers a lot of different dishes.
Verry friendly service! Thank you - our recommendation!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Located next to Amstel, this place is missing a sign with their name on the outside, so you'll have to know what to look for. We ordered a cheese platter and got extra olives and bread as a "starter" which was a nice surprise. Staff were â€¦

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Shared a cold mezze plate, borek, sigara borek and lamb balls - all were tasty. Nice spot outside and comfortable and cozy interior as well

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Decent food but took 90 minutes to serve

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Really excellent food and cozy place. Open kitchen so all the mouth watering smells strike you add soon as you go through the door. Will definitely be back

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Fast service, good pizzas. Only we had warm beer on a very hot day. Restaurants in NL are not used to dealing with 30 degrees; I guess one of their fridges broke down due to the extreme weather conditions. But this still doesn't justify warm beer when you most need a refreshing one end of the day.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Great pizzas for a fair price. Great location at the Amstel river. Terrace for warm weather but also a nice view from inside. Prosecco wasn't cheap and tasted average, but all in all, this is my favorite pizzeria in Amsterdam. â€¦

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Amazing place, they made a custom grilled chicken dish that I feel in love with. Highly recommend this place for its ambiance, food and wonderful staff.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Friendly staff and nice to sit outside but the food was average at best. Very oily and just bland tasting. Pricey for what was given.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Turned up at this restaurant especailly after finding on trip advisor! Owner and staff were rude!! Gave us a menu after having to ask for one and then weâ€™re told sorry no English menu. No help to understand things. We got up and left. Very rude and unwelcoming! Would not recommend at all

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Very nice place. Tasty food and excellent service. Dishes for every taste including kids

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Great food and very friendly and attentive waiters. Always a great time there!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Great place, beautifully furnished, and the service is just amazing, waiter gave us great attention, took the time to explain what's on the menu, who the chefs were, what their specialties were, just great!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Real good food, fair prices and a nice outside patio with comfortable seats. Thorough recommendation!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Great service, great food. Real taste of the mediterranean/middle-east
